answers.answer: Some cramping is normal during pregnancy because of your uterus growing. If you are having kidney pain I think you should go get checked and make sure you don't have a kidney infection because that can be harmful to a pregnancy.

question: Ok im 5 weeks pregnant and last week I was having period like cramps and this week I stopped having them today I'm feeling some cramping idk if this is normal I'm also on metformin for diabetes. I have also had this kidney pain on both sides I've had a miscarriage before I'm just curious should I be worried?
title: scared!
